sql.check-permission: select count(*) from( select UserId,Permission from [dbo].[UserRoleMapping] urm left join [dbo].[PermissionRoleMapping] prm on urm.Role=prm.Role where urm.UserId=@UserId and prm.Permission=@Permission union select UserId,Permission from [dbo].[PermissionUserMapping] where UserId=@UserId and Permission=@Permission ) tb1
